verbose_text: As illustrated in XREF_FIG, the LC3-II / LC3-I ratio and Beclin1 expression levels were significantly downregulated, while the expression levels of p62, mTOR, p-mTOR, p-S6K1 and p-4EBP1 were significantly upregulated in aging cells following transfection with miR-30a mimics, suggesting that miR-30a could inhibit autophagy of aging cells.
